description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It includes a template with dynamic content based on the component's state and a method to handle user input (pressing Enter) to toggle the favorited state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a button with toggleable favorited state.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the Enter key input to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.

search-terms: JS component with state and input handling
